name: Frostwrench
description:
After the Grand Clockwork was attacked by a fierce, cold-blooded deity, Emily sets out to investigate the cause and repair all damage that has been done. With the help of her trusty wrench, she ventures off to combat this mysterious entity and restore the space-time continuum to it's rightful state.

Frostwrench was created in 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2020, and was awarded 1st place at the Kennesaw State University jam site!

Follow my Twitter for more updates!
